quote: A simple roll of the dice can determine the outcome of a game.
author: Justin Kaiser

quote: I think it's wrong that only one company makes the game Monopoly.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I would literally play 'Monopoly' by myself.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Play your cards right, and you can change the game.
author: Unknown

quote: In the end, it's not the games we play but the memories we make that truly matter.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes, the best move is not to play.
author: WarGames

quote: A game well played is a life well lived.
author: Unknown

quote: The beauty of a game lies not in its pieces but in the minds of those who play it.
author: Unknown

quote: Good old monopoly, training innocent children to become landlords since 1903
author: Juno Dawson

quote: The dice never lie; they're a reflection of life's randomness
author: Unknown

quote: In the game of life, play like a pawn, think like a king.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: The game is afoot!
author: Sherlock Holmes

quote: To win, you must dare to risk it all.
author: Risk

quote: Fortune favors the bold, especially in board games.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it, one move at a time.
author: Unknown

quote: No game is ever truly lost until the last piece falls.
author: Unknown

quote: It's not whether you win or lose, it's how you play the game.
author: Grantland Rice

quote: The true test of a player is how they handle defeat.
author: Unknown

quote: A true player knows when to hold 'em, when to fold 'em, and when to walk away.
author: Kenny Rogers

quote: Chess is war over the board. The object is to crush the opponent's mind.
author: Bobby Fischer

quote: Chess is everything: art, science, and sport.
author: Anatoly Karpov

quote: You can't win if you don't play.
author: Unknown

quote: I think UNO is pretty underrated.
author: Ethan Cooke
